titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to James Orton, Assistant Surgeon in Charge of the Bushire Residency

mods.abstract: Letter informs James Orton that he is to be in charge of the Residency while William Bruce is in Shiraz. Includes instructions regarding the handling of letters, the payment of salaries, and the receipt of military stores for the use of the Persian Government.
